pages.text: The Life Crystal has a 25% chance to be dropped when a player dies. They can be used to get Regeneration II for 2:30 at the cost of 1% potential, 1% insanity, and 1 $(l:reagents/advanced_reagent)Advanced Reagent$(/l). The Life Crystal is a bound crystal, so you can only use a crystal that is bound to you. See $(l:information/rebinding)Rebinding$(/l) for more information.
